docs.snippet: Xerox Corp privately rejected a bid to merge its document business with financial printing firm RR Donnelley & Sons Co, the Wall Street Journal reported Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Xerox Corp privately rejected a bid to merge its document business with financial printing firm RR Donnelley & Sons Co, the Wall Street Journal reported Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Xerox Rejects RR Donnelley Merger Proposal: WSJ

docs.snippet: China's crude steel output rose 1.7 percent to 69.47 million tonnes in June from a year ago, data from the National Bureau of Statistics showed on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: China's crude steel output rose 1.7 percent to 69.47 million tonnes in June from a year ago, data from the National Bureau of Statistics showed on Friday.

headline.main: China's June Crude Steel Output Rises 1.7 Percent on Year, First-Half Output Down 1.1 Percent: Stats Bureau

docs.snippet: Samsung Electronics Co Ltd said on Friday it was in talks to acquire a stake in Chinese automaker BYD, a move it said would help the South Korean electronics giant boost its chip business for electric cars....
docs.lead_paragraph: Samsung Electronics Co Ltd said on Friday it was in talks to acquire a stake in Chinese automaker BYD, a move it said would help the South Korean electronics giant boost its chip business for electric cars.

headline.main: Samsung Electronics Seeks Stake in China Automaker BYD, Electric Car Chips Boost
headline.print_headline: Samsung Electronics Seeks Stake in China Automaker BYD, Electric Car Chips Boost

docs.snippet: French President Francois Hollande said Thursday's lethal attack on the southern city of Nice was clearly a 'terrorist' assault and that the state of emergency imposed since a previous attack on Paris last November would be extended for another th...
docs.lead_paragraph: French President Francois Hollande said Thursday's lethal attack on the southern city of Nice was clearly a 'terrorist' assault and that the state of emergency imposed since a previous attack on Paris last November would be extended for another three months.

headline.main: France's Hollande Says Nice Attack Undeniably of 'Terrorist Nature'
headline.print_headline: France's Hollande Says Nice Attack Undeniably of 'Terrorist Nature'

docs.snippet: Chinese banks extended 1.38 trillion yuan (153.90 billion pounds) in net new yuan loans in June, exceeding analyst expectations, coming in higher than the previous month's lending of 985.5 billion yuan....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chinese banks extended 1.38 trillion yuan (153.90 billion pounds) in net new yuan loans in June, exceeding analyst expectations, coming in higher than the previous month's lending of 985.5 billion yuan.

headline.main: China June New Yuan Loans Rise to 1.38 Trillion Yuan, Beating Forecasts
headline.print_headline: China June New Yuan Loans Rise to 1.38 Trillion Yuan, Beating Forecasts

docs.snippet: Investment growth in China's real estate in the first half of 2016 contracted for the second month, raising expectations that more stimulus would be rolled out in the remaining of this year to help grow sales - especially in smaller cities where t...
docs.lead_paragraph: Investment growth in China's real estate in the first half of 2016 contracted for the second month, raising expectations that more stimulus would be rolled out in the remaining of this year to help grow sales - especially in smaller cities where the housing inventory level is high.

headline.main: China First-Half Property Investment Growth Slows for Second Month
headline.print_headline: China First-Half Property Investment Growth Slows for Second Month

docs.snippet: Pat Summitt was remembered as a loving mother, a loyal friend and a tireless fighter as well as a champion coach Thursday in a public ceremony honoring the person who built the Tennessee women's basketball dynasty....
